title: Help
content:
Hi,   
This is my first post   
I have been set a project to design a poster based on world music (folk, reggae etc.). I would like to know if there are any books, websites etc. that can help me design the poster. Please help with things such as fonts, page layouts etc.   
THANK YOU   
Please if you have any of your own suggestions do share
author: invincible

comments.content:
Some people use Neuland to evoke African themes.   
If you're looking to unify various world musics with one font,   
try something from Eastern Europe, like here:   
 [http://www.stormtype.com/](http://web.archive.org/web/20131013031125/http:/www.stormtype.com/)   
   
hhp
Jaisal, for folk music do a Google search for Woody Guthrie or Pete Seager. And for Reggae Bob Marley. Dan
